fields.name: capacity
fields.description: Maximum number of entries allowed in the cache

fields.name: evictionFactor
fields.description: The factor by which the entries will be evicted once the cache is full

fields.name: evictionPolicy
fields.description: The policy which is used to evict entries once the cache is full

fields.name: defaultMaxAge
fields.description:
The default value in seconds which all the cache entries are valid. '-1' means, the entries are
valid forever. This will be overwritten by the the `maxAge` property set when inserting item to
the cache

fields.name: cleanupInterval
fields.description: Interval (in seconds) of the timer task, which will clean up the cache

parameters.name: cacheConfig
parameters.description: Configurations for the `cache:Cache` object

methods.name: init
methods.description:
Initializes new `cache:Cache` instance.
```ballerina
cache:Cache cache = new(capacity = 10, evictionFactor = 0.2);
```

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Key of the value to be cached

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Value to be cached. Value should not be `()`

parameters.name: maxAge
parameters.description:
The time in seconds for which the cache entry is valid. If the value is '-1', the entry is
valid forever.

returnParameters.description: `()` if successfully added to the cache or a `cache:Error` if a `()` value is inserted to the cache.

methods.name: put
methods.description:
Adds the given key value pair to the cache. If the cache previously contained a value associated with the
provided key, the old value wil be replaced by the newly-provided value.
```ballerina
check cache.put("Hello", "Ballerina");
```

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Key of the cached value, which should be retrieved

returnParameters.description:
The cached value associated with the provided key or a `cache:Error` if the provided cache key is not
exisiting in the cache or any error occurred while retrieving the value from the cache.

methods.name: get
methods.description:
Returns the cached value associated with the provided key.
```ballerina
any value = check cache.get(key);
```

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Key of the cache value, which needs to be discarded from the cache

returnParameters.description:
`()` if successfully discarded the value or a `cache:Error` if the provided cache key is not present
in the cache

methods.name: invalidate
methods.description:
Discards a cached value from the cache.
```ballerina
check cache.invalidate(key);
```

returnParameters.description:
`()` if successfully discarded all the values from the cache or a `cache:Error` if any error
occurred while discarding all the values from the cache.

methods.name: invalidateAll
methods.description:
Discards all the cached values from the cache.
```ballerina
check cache.invalidateAll();
```

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key to be checked in the cache

returnParameters.description:
`true` if a cached value is available for the provided key or `false` if there is no cached value
associated for the given key

methods.name: hasKey
methods.description:
Checks whether the given key has an associated cached value.
```ballerina
boolean result = cache.hasKey(key);
```

returnParameters.description: Array of all the keys from the cache

methods.name: keys
methods.description:
Returns a list of all the keys from the cache.
```ballerina
string[] keys = cache.keys();
```

returnParameters.description: The size of the cache

methods.name: size
methods.description:
Returns the size of the cache.
```ballerina
int result = cache.size();
```

returnParameters.description: The capacity of the cache

methods.name: capacity
methods.description:
Returns the capacity of the cache.
```ballerina
int result = cache.capacity();
```

parameters.name: cacheConfig
parameters.description: Configurations for the `cache:Cache` object

classes.name: Cache
classes.description:
The `cache:Cache` object, which is used for all the cache-related operations. It is not recommended to insert `()`
as the value of the cache since it doesn't make any sense to cache a nil.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Key of the value to be cached

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Value to be cached

parameters.name: maxAge
parameters.description: The time in seconds during which the cache entry is valid. '-1' means, the entry is valid forever

returnParameters.description:
`()` if successfully added to the cache or `Error` if any error occurred while inserting the entry
to the cache

methods.name: put
methods.description:
Adds the given key value pair to the cache. If the cache previously contained a value associated with the key, the
old value is replaced by the new value.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key used to retrieve the cached value

returnParameters.description:
The cached value associated with the given key or an `Error` if the provided cache key is not
available or if any error occurred while retrieving from the cache

methods.name: get
methods.description: Returns the cached value associated with the provided key.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Key of the cache entry which needs to be discarded

returnParameters.description:
`()` if successfully discarded or an `Error` if the provided cache key is not available or if any
error occurred while discarding from the cache

methods.name: invalidate
methods.description: Discards a cached value from the cache.

returnParameters.description:
`()` if successfully discarded all or  an `Error` if any error occurred while discarding all from the
cache

methods.name: invalidateAll
methods.description: Discards all the cached values from the cache.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key to be checked

returnParameters.description:
`true` if an associated cache value is available for the provided key or `false` if there is not a
cache value associated with the provided key

methods.name: hasKey
methods.description: Checks whether the given key has an associated cache value.

returnParameters.description: Array of all the keys from the cache

methods.name: keys
methods.description: Returns all keys from the cache.

returnParameters.description: The size of the cache

methods.name: size
methods.description: Returns the current size of the cache.

returnParameters.description: The capacity of the cache

methods.name: capacity
methods.description: Returns the capacity of the cache.

objectTypes.name: AbstractCache
objectTypes.description:
The `cache:AbstractCache` object is used for custom implementations of the Ballerina cache.
Any custom cache implementation should be object-wise similar.

errors.name: Error
errors.description: Represents Cache related errors. This will be returned if an error occurred while doing any of the cache operations.

enums.name: EvictionPolicy
enums.description: Possible types of eviction policy that can be passed into the `EvictionPolicy`.

modules.summary: This module provides APIs for in-memory caching by using a semi-persistent mapping from keys to values. Cache entries are added to the cache manually and are stored in the cache until either evicted or invalidated manually.

modules.description: This module provides APIs for in-memory caching by using a semi-persistent mapping from keys to values. Cache entries are added to the cache manually and are stored in the cache until either evicted or invalidated manually.

classes.description:
The `cache:Cache` object, which is used for all the cache-related operations. It is not recommended to insert `()`
as the value of the cache since it doesn't make any sense to cache a nil.

errors.description: Represents Cache related errors. This will be returned if an error occurred while doing any of the cache operations.

objectTypes.description:
The `cache:AbstractCache` object is used for custom implementations of the Ballerina cache.
Any custom cache implementation should be object-wise similar.

enums.description: Possible types of eviction policy that can be passed into the `EvictionPolicy`.
